editDialog.title: About me

dialog.content: Any certifications you hold will remain with you but the Company will no longer inherit any of your certifications. You will no longer be a member of any their projects or be able to view project details. The Company will not be able to nominate you as the responsible installer for Projects.
dialog.title: Are you sure?

dialog.error: An error occurred, please try again or contact an administrator
dialog.success: We have sent you an email with a link to reset your password, please follow the instruction in the email
dialog.title: Reset Password
